cu.edu.cujae.ceis.tree.iterators

Class StackNode<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cu.edu.cujae.ceis.tree.iterators.StackNode<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of elements stored in the tree

    public class StackNode<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for tree iterators that maintains node traversal state. Used in iterative tree traversal algorithms to track visited nodes and their children.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StackNode(BinaryTreeNode<E> node)
      Constructs a StackNode for the specified binary tree node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCount()
      Returns the visit count for this node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> getLeft()
      Returns the left child of the wrapped node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> getNode()
      Returns the wrapped binary tree node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> getRight()
      Returns the right child of the wrapped node.
      void incrementCount()
      Increments the visit count for this node.
